name: SMT Line 1
remarks: Primary SMT line for PB560 boards.

name: Mechanical Assembly Station 1
remarks: Pilot mechanical assembly station for PB560.

name: Mechanical Assembly Station 2
remarks: Additional station to support PB560 ramp-up on LINE-2.

name: Electrical Safety Test Bench
remarks: Performs electrical safety test according to PB560 procedures.

name: Functional Test Bench
remarks: Simulates patient breathing conditions and performs full functional test.

name: Final Inspection & Packing Station
remarks: Visual inspection and packing for shipment.
